meanings.definition: (ポルトガル語) 自分自身を正当化する、自分の価値を証明する、認められるようにする
meanings.english_definition: (Portuguese) to validate oneself, to justify oneself, to prove one's worth, to seek validation.

examples.sentence: Ele precisa validar-se perante o chefe.
examples.translation: He needs to validate himself before the boss.
examples.english_translation: He needs to prove his worth to the boss.

examples.sentence: Ela tenta constantemente validar-se aos olhos dos outros.
examples.translation: She constantly tries to validate herself in the eyes of others.
examples.english_translation: She constantly tries to gain validation from others.

examples.translation: It is important to validate oneself as a professional.
examples.english_translation: It is important to establish your credibility as a professional.

etymology.value: 派生語: validar (正当化する) + -se (再帰代名詞)

conjugation_examples.present: eu valido-me, tu validas-te, ele/ela/você valida-se, nós validamo-nos, vós validais-vos, eles/elas/vocês validam-se
conjugation_examples.preterite: eu validei-me, tu validaste-te, ele/ela/você validou-se, nós validámo-nos, vós validastes-vos, eles/elas/vocês validaram-se
conjugation_examples.future: eu validar-me-ei, tu validar-te-ás, ele/ela/você validar-se-á, nós validar-nos-emos, vós validar-vos-eis, eles/elas/vocês validar-se-ão

usage_notes.explanation: 「validar-se」は再帰動詞であり、主語が自分自身に対して行動を行うことを示します。この場合、自分自身の価値、能力、または行動を正当化または証明しようとする行為を指します。他者からの承認を求めるニュアンスも含まれます。

examples.correct: validar algo (正当化する対象が物事の場合)
examples.note: 「validar」は他者を正当化するという意味では通常使用されません。
再帰動詞であるため、再帰代名詞が必要です。

derivatives: válido (形容詞: 有効な、正当な)

readability_explanation.text: 「validar-se」は、自分自身を正当化したり、自分の価値を証明したりする行為を表すポルトガル語の動詞です。再帰動詞なので、「-se」が付きます。他者からの承認を求める意味合いも含まれます。

example_sentences.sentence: O artista procurava validar-se através da sua obra.
example_sentences.translation: The artist sought to validate himself through his work.

example_sentences.sentence: É importante validar-se no mercado de trabalho.
example_sentences.translation: It is important to validate oneself in the job market.

example_sentences.sentence: Ela precisava de se validar como mãe.
example_sentences.translation: She needed to validate herself as a mother.
example_sentences.meaning_category: 認められるようにする
